title: Smith Plot
description: Single-page application written with D3.js and Vue for plotting and comparing RF-network measurement data

title: Echo-Mongo
description: A REST API built with the Echo Framework for Golang. It implements MongoDB and Google Cloud Storage

title: Upload Stream with Akka and Google Cloud
description: An Akka Actor System Representing an IOT system. The repository contains a publishing client which publishes messages to PubSub telling the actor system to record or upload a file to Google Cloud for a particular IOT device. Then the subscription application receives the message from PubSub, and prompts that device to either record its data or to upload its data to Google Cloud Storage.

title: Nuxt Ghost Starter
description: A starter project for building a server-side rendered or statically generated site from Ghost blog data

title: RF-Network
description: Node module, written in Typescript, for parsing RF measurement data into a Network class

title: Gatsby Portfolio
description: This fine portfolio page built with Gatsby JS

title: JSNG - Ghost Blog Theme
description: Handlebars-templated theme written for the Ghost blogging platform
